name: Milkshakes & More
description:
Get the BIGGEST and the BEST Milkshake making app in the iTunes Store!

Create your own Milkshake from scratch!

Choose from over 250 realistic ingredients and decorations! There are so many choices, you'll NEVER get bored!


Come on, let's make a shake...

Choose your fav Milkshake Glass from a ton of styles & colors.
Next, drop in Scoops of your favorite Ice Cream flavors. Add yummy Sauces, Syrups, Fruits & Candies and then pour your choice of Milk Flavors.

You can Mix it any way you like, Thin, Medium, Thick or Chunky.

And now you're ready to decorate your Milkshake choosing from a HUGE selection of Sweet Candy Toppings, Flavored Whipped Creams and More!

When you're ready, drop in a straw and Sip all the creamy goodness right down. Yum!

You can drink it, save it to your photo library and share it with a friend.

There are so many backgrounds to pick from, you can have a different one for everyday of the month!

If you like our award winning app " Ice Cream! " you're going to LOVE Milkshakes & More!

To our fans....A huge thank you for your great support, suggestions and for the appreciation of the hard work and love that goes into making our games.

More Fun Games:
* French Fries!
* Ice Cream! Our Mega Summer Hit.
* Smoothies!
* Soup & Salad!
* a Pocket Buffet!

PixelPipeDreams.com
Our Apps are Sweet!
